name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quantum AI Health Copilot and Ambient Scribe for Practice Fusion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generative AI Copilot and Ambient Scribe to automate SOAP note generation and EHR tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Quantum AI Health Copilot and Ambient Scribe for Practice Fusion, the latest advancement in AI-generated medical documentation and solutions for physicians, medical practices, hospitals, and telehealth providers.

Quantum AI Health Copilot and Ambient Scribe for Practice Fusion significantly reduces physicians' time spent on data entry tasks for medical notes by using advanced Generative Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to automatically listen to the physician and patient and generate the medical progress note and ICD-10 billing codes.

➤ There is no more catching up on exam notes after hours. When the exam is done, so are your notes.

➤ Spend more quality face-to-face time with your patients, increase your billable hours, reduce your daily workload, and improve your patient experience and overall quality of care.

➤ Quantum AI Health Copilot and Ambient Scribe for Practice Fusion is built by physicians and powered by our latest Conversational AI, Generative AI, and Machine Learning technologies.

•  AI-generated medical notes & ICD-10 billing codes are completed and ready for review within seconds after the exam
•  Reduces physician burnout
•  Increases productivity by 20%
•  Saves physicians up to 3 hours per day of EHR data entry tasks
•  Increases patient satisfaction by 85%
•  In-office and Telehealth included
•  Integrates with Practice Fusion

➤ Learn more at https://www.quantumai.health

➤ Terms and Conditions
